info.title: TerraformCloud
info.description: This is the Terraform Cloud API. You can find more information in the [documentation](https://www.terraform.io/cloud-docs/api-docs)

get.summary: Lists all workspaces in an organization
Show a workspace in an organization

post.summary: Perform the apply action on a Run
Perform the cancel action on a Run
Perform the discard action on a Run

get.summary: Show a task stages in a run

message.example: Queued manually via the Terraform Enterprise API

CostEstimateId.name: cost_estimate_id
CostEstimateId.description: The id of the cost estimate

PaginationNumber.name: page[number]
PaginationNumber.description: The page to request. Defaults to the first page

PaginationSize.name: page[size]
PaginationSize.description: The page size to request. Defaults to the 20.

WorkspaceName.name: workspace_name
WorkspaceName.description: The name of the workspace to show

Include.name: include
Include.description: Additional resources to include in the response

TaskResultId.name: task_result_id
TaskResultId.description: The id of the task result

FilterRunOperation.name: filter[operation]
FilterRunOperation.description: List runs with the specified operations

FilterRunSource.name: filter[source]
FilterRunSource.description: List runs with the specified sources

FilterRunStatus.name: filter[status]
FilterRunStatus.description: List runs with the specified statuses

SearchRunSHA.name: search[commit]
SearchRunSHA.description: List runs for the specified commit SHA

SearchRunUser.name: search[user]
SearchRunUser.description: List runs for the specified user

comment.example: Reason that I performed the action
Reason that I am locking the workspace

Empty.description: A request which cannot contain any information
